roleset.name: emit, emit/provide
roleset.note: ISSUE-V NOTES: Member of Vncls appear-48.1.1, fulfilling-13.4.1, future_having-13.3. (from issue.01-v)
ISSUE-N NOTES: Based on nouns-00080. Comparison to issue.01-v. VN classes appear-48.1.1, fulfilling-13.4.1, and future_having-13.3. Framed by Katie. (from issue.01-n)
ISSUANCE-N NOTES: Based on nouns-00080. Comparison to issue.01-v. VN classes appear-48.1.1, fulfilling-13.4.1, and future_having-13.3. Framed by Katie. (from issuance.01-n)

example.name: active
example.text: Mrs. Hills must issue another review of the performance of those countries.
example.arg: another review of the performance of those countries

example.name: passive
example.text: ...[a report]-1 issued *trace*-1 earlier this year by McGraw-Hill's FW Dodge group.

example.name: with benefactive
example.text: [The warnings]-1, issued *trace*-1 to at least 100 criminal defense lawyers in several major cities in the last week, ...
example.arg: to at least 100 criminal defense lawyers

example.name: with attribute
example.text: [The debentures]-1 are being issued *trace*-1 at an issue price of $849 for each $1000 principal amount.
example.arg: at an issue price of $849 for each $1000 principal amount.

example.name: arg 1
example.text: an issue of a silver commemorative coin

example.name: Args 0, 1, 2
example.text: Companies are advised to seek advice from their tax counsel as to the applicable tax consequences of their issuance of securities to the Foundation.

example.name: args 1 and 3, NP only
example.text: Issuance of Certificate of Registration as a LLP.

roleset.name: problematic state
roleset.note: ISSUE-N NOTES: Roleset based on instances in BOLT P01, part 07. (from issue.02-n)

role.descr: stimulus of problematic state -- thing that is a problem
experiencer of problematic state -- who has a problem with 0?

example.name: With LVC
example.text: I take issue with people who say it is unpatriotic to criticize our government.
example.arg: with people who say it is unpatriotic to criticize our government.

example.name: More typical, arg0 only
example.text: I can understand that schools have their own interest chasing private gains but the government should never have private interest and have to be fair in the issue of education resources distributions .
